title: Czarina Arevalo
text:
Czarina Mae Arevalo (born 14 May 1985) is a Filipino former professional <a href="tennis">tennis</a> player.
Born in <a href="Ilocos%20Norte">Ilocos Norte</a>, Arevalo competed for the <a href="Philippines%20Fed%20Cup%20team">Philippines Fed Cup team</a> from 2000 to 2008, appearing in a record 32 ties. She won 14 singles and 11 doubles rubbers during her Fed Cup career.
Arevalo represented her country at the <a href="2003%20Afro-Asian%20Games">2003 Afro-Asian Games</a>, <a href="2006%20Asian%20Games">2006 Asian Games</a> and in multiple editions of the <a href="Southeast%20Asian%20Games">Southeast Asian Games</a>. She was a five-time Southeast Asian Games medalist.
